comment: I took sculpting 1 and it was overall a good experience. Patient and willing to work with you if you have never used power tools or a certain medium. Doesn't offer much feedback unless asked a specific question. Gave us too much time on certain assignments and not enough for others, supposed to have 4 assignments and only had 3.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things

comment: no covid changes were made for hybrid learning  staring at a video of a classroom for three hours. assigned a project so late that we only got one in class day to work on it before finals causing people to rush and ruin projects. also randomly changed the day of our final and never gave any details, no time and no place nice guy, awful teacher

he never walked around or offered any feedback while working on a project. he was helpful when asked a specific question, but seriously.. I would ask him a question and then so would someone else and the answers are opposites. very confusing when actually trying to learn about ceramics. also, random quizzes over material he never taught us!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: Kieth is a fantastic teacher if you work. If you don't, you can't complain about anyone but yourself.

Highly recommended professor.  Very helpful, down to earth, and approachable.  Always willing to help the student, no matter what level you are at.  He knows his stuff!! He gives room for adjustment to the class schedule, so the classroom is stress-free when assignments might need more time. He makes this class a high energy, fun experience!
Awsome guy, great attitude, fun class!  Be prepared to spend alot of time outside of class though.
